### Lab at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position not specified)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the pipes are within the maximum distance allowed for connections. Move closer to the target position before attempting to connect.

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to place the new entity before attempting to place it. The maximum distance for placement is 10 tiles.

### Errors when the lab is without power
- Check the connections to the power network and ensure that the lab is connected to a power source. If it is not connected, adjust the layout to include power lines or poles.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
